title: What is true when comet is farthest from sun

content.question: A comet moves in an elliptical orbit around the Sun. Which of the following is at a maximum when the comet is at its farthest distance from the Sun?

choices.label: Gravitational potential energy of the Suncomet system
Total energy of the Sun-comet system

content.answer: Gravitational potential energy of the Suncomet system

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
